headline: Chubb Unveils "The Remittance Trust Trap": Global Research Exposes Hidden Vulnerabilities Among Senders, Especially Gig Workers
summary: Chubb, a world leader in insurance, today announced the findings of its comprehensive global study of 3,500 international remittance senders in its ground-breaking report, "The Remittance Trust Trap: Revealing Hidden Vulnerabilities," which uncovers critical and often overlooked risks faced by international remittance senders, particularly those in the burgeoning gig economy.
